subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Ray Allen made a 3-pointer at the buzzer after Eddie House knocked away Jason Richardson’s inbounds pass with 4.7 seconds left to give the visiting Boston Celtics a 96-95 victory over the Charlotte Bobcats last night.
snippet: Ray Allen made a 3-pointer at the buzzer after Eddie House knocked away Jason Richardson’s inbounds pass with 4.7 seconds left to give the visiting Boston Celtics a 96-95 victory over the Charlotte Bobcats last night.
